00123 #ifdef __GNUG__ 
00124     /* GCC configuration */
00125     #define FORTIFY_PROVIDE_ARRAY_NEW
00126     #define FORTIFY_PROVIDE_ARRAY_DELETE
00127 #endif
00128 
00129 #ifdef __HIGHC__
00130     /* Metaware HighC configuration */
00131     #define FORTIFY_PROVIDE_ARRAY_NEW
00132     #define FORTIFY_PROVIDE_ARRAY_DELETE
00133 #endif
00134 
00135 #ifdef __BC45__
00136     /* Borland C++ 4.5 configuration */
00137     #define FORTIFY_PROVIDE_ARRAY_NEW
00138     #define FORTIFY_PROVIDE_ARRAY_DELETE
00139     #define FORTIFY_FAIL_ON_ZERO_MALLOC
00140 #endif
00141 
00142 #ifdef __SASC
00143   /* SAS configuration */
00144   #define FORTIFY_FAIL_ON_ZERO_MALLOC
00145 #endif

00147 /* Allocators */
00148 #define Fortify_Allocator_malloc            0    /* ANSI C   */
00149 #define Fortify_Allocator_calloc            1    /* ANSI C   */
00150 #define Fortify_Allocator_realloc           2    /* ANSI C   */
00151 #define Fortify_Allocator_strdup            3    /*      C   */
00152 #define Fortify_Allocator_new               4    /* ANSI C++ */
00153 #define Fortify_Allocator_array_new         5    /* Some C++ */
00154 
00155 /* Deallocators */
00156 #define Fortify_Deallocator_nobody          0
00157 #define Fortify_Deallocator_free            1    /* ANSI C   */
00158 #define Fortify_Deallocator_realloc         2    /* ANSI C   */
00159 #define Fortify_Deallocator_delete          3    /* ANSI C++ */
00160 #define Fortify_Deallocator_array_delete    4    /* Some C++ */

00169 /* Core Fortify Functions */
00170 void *Fortify_Allocate  (size_t size, unsigned char allocator, const char *file, unsigned long line);
00171 void  Fortify_Deallocate(void *uptr,  unsigned char deallocator, const char *file, unsigned long line);

00186 /* Fortify versions of the ANSI C memory allocation functions */
00187 void *Fortify_malloc(size_t size, const char *file, unsigned long line);
00188 void *Fortify_realloc(void *ptr, size_t new_size, const char *file, unsigned long line);
00189 void *Fortify_calloc(size_t num, size_t size, const char *file, unsigned long line);
00190 void  Fortify_free(void *uptr, const char *file, unsigned long line);
00191

00194     char *Fortify_strdup(const char *oldStr, const char *file, unsigned long line);

00206 #ifdef __cplusplus
00207 #include <new.h>
00208 
00209     /* Fortify versions of new and delete */
00210     void *operator new(size_t size);
00211     void *operator new(size_t size, const char *file, unsigned long line);
00212     void  operator delete(void *pointer);
00213     void  Fortify_PreDelete(const char *file, unsigned long line);
00214     void  Fortify_PostDelete();
00215 
00216     /* Some compilers use a different new operator for newing arrays.
00217      * This includes GNU G++ (2.6.0) and Borland C++ (4.02)
00218      */
00219     #ifdef FORTIFY_PROVIDE_ARRAY_NEW
00220         void *operator new[](size_t size);
00221         void *operator new[](size_t size, const char *file, unsigned long line);
00222     #endif
00223 
00224     /* Some compilers provide a different delete operator for deleting arrays.
00225      * This incldues GNU G++ (2.6.0)
00226      */
00227     #ifdef FORTIFY_PROVIDE_ARRAY_DELETE
00228         void  operator delete[](void *pointer);
00229     #endif
00230 
00231 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00232 
00233 #ifndef __FORTIFY_C__ /* Only define the macros if we're NOT in fortify.c */
00234 
00235 /* Add file and line information to the fortify calls */
00236 #if defined(USE_FORTIFY) || defined(USE_BSD_FORTIFY)
00237     /* Core Fortify Functions */
00238     #define Fortify_CheckAllMemory()       Fortify_CheckAllMemory(__FILE__, __LINE__)
00239     #define Fortify_ListAllMemory()        Fortify_ListAllMemory (__FILE__, __LINE__)
00240     #define Fortify_DumpAllMemory()        Fortify_DumpAllMemory (__FILE__, __LINE__)
00241     #define Fortify_CheckPointer(ptr)      Fortify_CheckPointer(ptr, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00242     #define Fortify_LabelPointer(ptr,str)  Fortify_LabelPointer(ptr, str, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00243     #define Fortify_EnterScope()           Fortify_EnterScope(__FILE__, __LINE__)
00244     #define Fortify_LeaveScope()           Fortify_LeaveScope(__FILE__, __LINE__)
00245     #define Fortify_OutputStatistics()     Fortify_OutputStatistics(__FILE__, __LINE__)
00246     #define Fortify_GetCurrentAllocation() Fortify_GetCurrentAllocation(__FILE__, __LINE__)
00247     #define Fortify_SetAllocationLimit(x)  Fortify_SetAllocationLimit(x, __FILE__, __LINE__)    
00248     #define Fortify_Disable()              Fortify_Disable(__FILE__, __LINE__)
00249 
00250     /* Fortify versions of the ANSI C memory allocation functions */
00251     #define malloc(size)                   Fortify_malloc(size, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00252     #define realloc(ptr,new_size)          Fortify_realloc(ptr, new_size, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00253     #define calloc(num,size)               Fortify_calloc(num, size, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00254     #define free(ptr)                      Fortify_free(ptr, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00255 
00256     /* Fortify versions of some non-ANSI C memory allocation functions */
00257     #ifdef FORTIFY_STRDUP
00258         #define strdup(ptr)                Fortify_strdup(ptr, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00259     #endif
00260 
00261     /* Fortify versions of new and delete */
00262     #ifdef __cplusplus
00263         #define Fortify_New                new(__FILE__, __LINE__)
00264         #define Fortify_Delete             for(gbl_FortifyMagic = 1, \
00265                                                Fortify_PreDelete(__FILE__, __LINE__); \
00266                                                gbl_FortifyMagic; Fortify_PostDelete()) \
00267                                                        gbl_FortifyMagic = 0, delete
00268         #define new                        Fortify_New
00269         #define delete                     Fortify_Delete
00270     #endif /* __cplusplus */
00271 
00272 #else /* Define the special fortify functions away to nothing */
00273 
00274     #define Fortify_CheckAllMemory()       ((void)0)
00275     #define Fortify_ListAllMemory()        ((void)0)
00276     #define Fortify_DumpAllMemory()        ((void)0)
00277     #define Fortify_CheckPointer(ptr)      1 
00278     #define Fortify_LabelPointer(ptr,str)  ((void)0)
00279     #define Fortify_SetOutputFunc(func)    ((void)0)
00280     #define Fortify_SetMallocFailRate(p)   ((void)0)
00281     #define Fortify_EnterScope()           ((void)0)
00282     #define Fortify_LeaveScope()           ((void)0)
00283     #define Fortify_OutputStatistics()     ((void)0)
00284     #define Fortify_GetCurrentAllocation() ((void)0)
00285     #define Fortify_SetAllocationLimit(x)  ((void)0)
00286     #define Fortify_Disable()              ((void)0)
00287 
00288     #ifdef __cplusplus    
00289         #define Fortify_New                    new
00290         #define Fortify_Delete                 delete
00291     #endif /* __cplusplus */
00292 
00293 #endif /* USE_FORTIFY || USE_BSD_FORTIFY */
00294 #endif /* __FORTIFY_C__   */
00295 #endif /* __FORTIFY_H__   */
00296 #endif /* _MSC_VER <= 6.0 */
